<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/workspaces/{workspaceId}/settings/studios"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the Studios settings of the workspace identified by the given `workspaceId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
